package ch7;

public class StrEqual_1 {

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		String s1 = "Java";
	    String s2;
	    s2=s1;
	    if (s1 == s2)
	        System.out.println("s1 == s2");
	    else
	        System.out.println("s1 != s2");

	}

}
